No, I don’t really think Bitcoin was created to fund Ripple. (But I can’t know that with 100% certainty. That’s my point.)

My position is that we can’t know for sure who created Bitcoin and that we shouldn’t base Bitcoin’s importance on who we hope Satoshi is or who we want him/her/them to be. And I like to illustrate my position in the most maddening way possible, haha.
Bitcoin was created to fund Ripple. Ripple predates Bitcoin. Where is your God now?
